actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit tax-free distributions of property by cooperative housing corporations to its shareholders, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit a tax-free (to corporation and shareholder) distribution of a dwelling unit by a cooperative housing corporation to its shareholder in exchange for the shareholder's stock in such corporation.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit tax-free distributions of property by cooperative housing corporations to its shareholders, and for other purposes.
